arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah deserves Anfield STATUE for spearheading Liverpool's title charge
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah's form for Liverpool is phenomenal and the Egyptian king is the Premier League's top scorer with 27 goals, while he also has 17 assists

arts.ttl: Algeria, Egypt, Morocco edge closer to 2026 WC
arts.sum: Algeria, Egypt and Morocco all moved closer to World Cup qualification with home success on Tuesday but South Africa face being docked points after fielding an ineligible player.

arts.ttl: 2024/25 Premier League Team of the Season So Far: Salah, Isak, Guimaraes
arts.sum: With just nine games remaining, the Premier League team of the season features stars from Liverpool, Newcastle United, Nottingham Forest and more.

arts.ttl: Algeria, Egypt and Morocco on track for 2026 World Cup
arts.sum: Algeria, Egypt and Morocco remain on track to reach the 2026 World Cup but Sudan's unlikely bid to qualify suffers a setback.

arts.ttl: Is Salah essential for the final FPL Gameweeks?
arts.sum: Fresh from breaking the all-time record for FPL points, some are now debating Salah's essentialness The post Is Salah essential for the final FPL Gameweeks? appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah or Cristiano Ronaldo? Why Liverpool star has better Premier League legacy than Manchester United legend
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah is enjoying an excellent season with Liverpool but there has been fierce debate as to whether he has a better Premier League legacy than Cristiano Ronaldo.

arts.ttl: What Trent's exit would mean for Liverpool... and Salah
arts.sum: Liverpool are facing the prospect of losing Trent Alexander-Arnold on a free transfer at the end of the season as Real Madrid advance in talks over a move to take him to the Bernabeu.

arts.ttl: Salah set to snub Saudi: Liverpool optimism grows despite Trent exit
arts.sum: Liverpool are growing increasingly optimistic that Mohamed Salah will extend his contract, according to a report. Salah set to snub Saudi: Liverpool optimism grows despite Trent exit

arts.ttl: Liverpool Optimistic Salah Will Sign Deal Amid Alexander-Arnold Blow
arts.sum: Liverpool are increasingly confident that Mohamed Salah will pen an extended contract instead of leaving as a free agent

arts.ttl: Arne Slot's dream Liverpool XI as Mo Salah stays and five big-money signings planned
arts.sum: Liverpool look set to win the Premier League title this season but there could be some stunning signings in the pipeline at Anfield this summer as the Reds aim to keep a hold of their out-of-contract stars
